name: Beat of the Dead Horse
description:
Made in collaboration with zed_studios (programming) and stripedpants (art)!

Submission for the 2022 Game-Off Game Jam. You play as a racehorse brought back from the dead to beat the crap out of his former owner in this rhythm based punch-out style mini-game. 

NOTE: You may need to play without bluetooth headphones since the audio seems to lag with them on.
